content: You can view this agent and its stored results, but starting new AI chats isnâ€™t permitted for your current role. Need access? Reach out to your administrator or the agent owner to request permission.

comment.text: This text explains to users why they cannot start a new AI chat. It appears on a screen indicating a lack of access and instructs them to contact an administrator or agent owner to request permission. Translators should ensure the message remains polite and clearly communicates the restriction.
